function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases, such as COVID-19, impacting global society","Impact":"Disruption of societal and economic activities, increased morbidity and mortality","Mitigation":"Implementation of public health measures, vaccination campaigns, and early detection systems","Technologies":"Health surveillance systems, contact tracing apps, and testing technologies","People":"Global population, particularly vulnerable and high-traffic groups","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, and international organizations"},{"Description":"Neglect of major conservation issues during the pandemic","Impact":"Loss of focus on biodiversity conservation and ecosystem health, exacerbation of existing environmental challenges","Mitigation":"Integration of conservation perspectives into media coverage, policy advocacy, and public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Remote sensing and monitoring technologies, data visualization tools, and communication platforms","People":"Conservation organizations, environmental advocates, and policymakers","Owner":"Conservation organizations, media outlets, and governmental bodies"},{"Description":"Reduction in conservation funding and government commitments due to economic downturn","Impact":"Underfunding of critical conservation projects, decline in environmental protection efforts, and loss of biodiversity","Mitigation":"Collaborative efforts to secure alternative funding, diversification of revenue sources, and lobbying for continued government support","Technologies":"Fundraising platforms, crowdfunding solutions, and digital advocacy tools","People":"Conservation organizations, environmental philanthropists, and government agencies","Owner":"Conservation organizations, private donors, and government representatives"}]}
